item.title: DAF XF 105 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 12, 2025

DAF XF 105 v1.0 ETS2

Completely redesigned EU interior. We added a lot of new parts and replaced the standard texture
– Redesigned external model.
– Advanced coupling supported.
– Support of all possible DLC on accessories and flags.
– Support for coloring – not complete. Coloring on the roof to go to is not entirely correct.
– A large number of tuning salon and exterior model
– Added some paint_job.
– Added several independent accessories in the cabin (requires the “DLC – Cabin Accessories”)
– Support the “DLC – XF Tuning Pack” (requires the “DLC – XF Tuning Pack”)
– Added several options for chassis and cabs.
– And other changes
Mod replaces the standard DAF XF105 of the game.

Credits: VANK

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Realistic Brutal Graphics And Weather V11.9 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 12, 2025

Realistic Brutal Graphics And Weather V11.9 1.55 ETS2

Changelog
Replace Some Lightning Bolts
Corrected Some Truck Lights
Other Tweaks And Improvements

Full Enhanced Weather And Graphics
Full Weather System
Compatible To Work With ETS Game Version 1.55.x
New Realistic LED Street Lamps Lighting
New Realistic Semaphores Timings
Compatible To Work With Majority Of Maps
Realistic Reflections, Rain, Sun, Lights etc
Realistic Truck Physics & Cabin (Wet & Dry) – Specific Made To Use With RBGW
Realistic Truck Physics To Work With Keyboard, Gamepad, Or Steering Wheel
Realistic Lights Low/High Beams Based on Latest Truck Lamps Technology – Specific Made To Use With RBGW
Realistic Cloud Shadows
Realistic Sun
Realistic Sun Rays

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Realistic Rain & Water & Thunder Sounds V8.2 1.55 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 12, 2025

Realistic Rain & Water & Thunder Sounds V8.2 1.55 ATS

Compatible To Work With ETS Game Version 1.55.x
Realistic Lightning Bolts
Realistic Water
Realistic Sea, Rivers, Lakes, Beachs etc
Realistic Thunder Sounds (Over 40 HQ Sounds)
Realistic Thunder Sounds Inside Cabin & Outside Cabin Of The Truck.
Realistic Rain Drops And Windshield Effects.
Realistic Rain
Realistic Rain Effects
Realistic Rain Sounds
Realistic Lightning
Realistic Lightning Bolts
Rain Particles/Spray Wheels (Truck & AI Traffic)
Custom Truck Outside View – Further Zoom Out (Keyboard Key 2) Zoom In / Out (Mouse Wheel)

News & Updates:
Replace Some Lightning Bolts
Other Tweaks And Improvements

Credits: kas
